mapper.select: SELECT count(lci.ID) FROM t_lottery_chance_info lci, t_lottery_chance_rule_info lcri WHERE lci.LOTTERY_CHANCE_RULE_INFO_ID = lcri.ID AND lcri.`CODE` = #{code} AND lcri.`STATUS` = 0 AND lci.USER_ID = #{userId} AND lcri.ADD_TIME <= CURDATE() AND CURDATE() <= lcri.END_TIME

SELECT IFNULL(sum(lci.LOTTERY_NUM), 0) FROM t_lottery_chance_info lci, t_lottery_chance_rule_info lcri WHERE lci.LOTTERY_CHANCE_RULE_INFO_ID = lcri.ID AND lcri.`CODE` = #{code} AND lcri.`STATUS` = 0 AND lci.USER_ID = #{userId} AND lcri.ADD_TIME <= CURDATE() AND CURDATE() <= lcri.END_TIME

SELECT , lcr.`NAME` as chanceRuleInfoName FROM t_lottery_chance_info lci, t_lottery_chance_rule_info lcr WHERE lci.USER_ID = #{userId} AND lci.USE_NUM > 0 AND lci.LOTTERY_CHANCE_RULE_INFO_ID = lcr.ID ORDER BY lci.id ASC LIMIT 1 for update
SELECT IFNULL(sum(USE_NUM),0) FROM t_lottery_chance_info WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT , lcr.`NAME` as chanceRuleInfoName FROM t_lottery_chance_info lci, t_lottery_chance_rule_info lcr WHERE lci.LOTTERY_CHANCE_RULE_INFO_ID = lcr.ID AND lcr.CODE != 9 AND lci.ADD_TIME >= #{date} order by lci.id desc LIMIT 20

SELECT IFNULL(sum(t.total),0) FROM ( SELECT SUM(ACCOUNT) as total FROM rocky_b_tenderrecord WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND TENDER_TYPE in(0,1) AND PARENT_ID IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT SUM(ACCOUNT) as total FROM rocky_b_subscribe WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} UNION ALL SELECT SUM(bt.ACCOUNT) as total FROM rocky_b_tenderrecord bt WHERE bt.USER_ID = #{userId} AND bt.TENDER_TYPE = 2 UNION ALL SELECT SUM(ACCOUNT) as total FROM t_fix_tender_detail WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND `STATUS` in(0,1,3) ) t

SELECT IFNULL(sum(lci.USE_NUM), 0) FROM t_lottery_chance_info lci, t_lottery_chance_rule_info lcri WHERE lci.LOTTERY_CHANCE_RULE_INFO_ID = lcri.ID AND lcri.`CODE` = #{code} AND lcri.`STATUS` = 0 and (lci.IS_REMINDED=2 or lci.IS_REMINDED is null) AND lci.USER_ID = #{userId} AND lcri.ADD_TIME <= CURDATE() AND CURDATE() <= lcri.END_TIME
